mapper.insert: insert into q_questionnaire(questionnaire_id, questionnaire_name, company_id, project_id, system_id, create_time) values (#{questionnaireId},#{questionnaireName},#{companyId},#{projectId},#{systemId},#{createTime})
mapper.update:
update q_questionnaire set
questionnaire_name = #{questionnaireName},
company_id = #{companyId},
project_id = #{projectId},
system_id = #{systemId},
update_time = #{updateTime} where questionnaire_id = #{questionnaireId}
update q_questionnaire set generated_url=#{generatedUrl}, generate_status_code=#{generateStatusCode}, update_time = #{updateTime} where questionnaire_id = #{questionnaireId}
mapper.select: select a.questionnaire_id, a.questionnaire_name, a.company_id, b.company_name, a.project_id, c.project_name, a.system_id, d.system_name, a.generate_status_code, GET_DICT_NAME(a.generate_status_code) as generate_status_name, a.generated_url, a.create_time from q_questionnaire a left join c_company b on a.company_id = b.company_id left join p_project c on a.project_id = c.project_id left join s_system d on a.company_id = d.company_id where questionnaire_id=#{questionnaireId}
